question.title: Android 14 - Unable to enable SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM permission
question.body:
Application which fires local notifications for Users in Android 14 the SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM permission needs to be explicitly granted by Users otherwise a security exception is now thrown.

I am initiating a request for the permission to the User and the modal is successfully popping but the option to toggle the permission on / off is greyed out as seen in the attached screen capture?

I have added the permission in the Android manifest and am initiating the request with the below code

  @Override
    protected void onResume() {
        super.onResume();
        // Check if the app can schedule exact alarms
        AlarmManager alarmManager = (AlarmManager) getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE);
        if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.S && !alarmManager.canScheduleExactAlarms()) {
            // If not, request the SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM permission
            Intent intent = new Intent(android.provider.Settings.ACTION_REQUEST_SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM);
            intent.setData(Uri.parse("package:" + getPackageName()));
            startActivity(intent);
        }   
    }
